website_summaries.verdict: Rather than folding up, this balance beam comes in sections that are attached at the ends with hook-and-loop closure panels.
pros: Synthetic suede cover sewn around two-layer foam core
Hook-and-loop closure panels at each end to join sections together
Each beam comes with hook-and-loop panels that span four inches in height
Lightweight and easy for children to set up
cons: Must buy more than one section for a usable length

customer_reviews.title: Good, but didn't come as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This is the second beam we purchased to be able to attach to the first beam we bought that is actually pictured. We received a completely different beam from a different manufacturer and it does not even connect to the one that we had previously purchased. If we don't get a replacement for the second beam then we will be sending both back.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3 of them connected them together with the velcro and it is great the kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time, and in one piece. I bought 3 of them connected them together with the velcro and it is great the kids love it. Being a former gymnast I was nervous on how the quality would be. But very impressed for the price it is very stable and not flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey Madness

customer_reviews.title: Good practice beam for small children
customer_reviews.text: I coached gymnastics for 10 years and say this beam would only work for preschool or beginning. I bought it for my son who turned 4. It is too soft or flexible to perform real skills on expecting that one should learn how to react or learn balance. However saying that, it is a good practice beam for the price to have at home. Any preteam or early team gymnast will find a way to have fun on it and mess around without getting hurt. I am 125lbs and the beam leans or deforms slightly when I stand or jump.
customer_reviews.author: K. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: This beam helped my 4 and 6 year old gymnast ...
customer_reviews.text: This beam helped my 4 and 6 year old gymnast gain the confidence to do their back walkover on the high beam. I gave it 4 stars because you HAVE to buy 2. Don't get me wrong, I knew before I bought it I had to get 2 (from other reviews). I just thought since it's sold separately it would/could have a purpose individually. I have not found any yet! For that reason I honestly feel it should be sold as a package. In my opinion it's a bit misleading.
customer_reviews.author: mrwhite45

customer_reviews.title: Tumble Trak Sectional Floor Balance Beam
customer_reviews.text: I only ordered one 4 ft. section of the floor balance beam. The one section is not as stiff/sturdy on each end as I had anticipated. When my child steps onto it, the beam end lifts off the floor a bit. I had some rubber shelving "paper" so I cut a strip of it to place under the beam (on the carpet) with 1 inch overage on each side and that does prevent slippage of beam. It is not as sturdy as wood, but our 4 year old beginner is enjoying her home practice sessions, and the price was very reasonable for our budget.
customer_reviews.author: shopper66

customer_reviews.title: You’ll need 2
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these brand new from Amazon and found 2 more used in our local area. Our daughters, 4 and 7, use these floor beams daily and have really improved on their balance as they get more practice at home. We really like how portable and soft these floor beams are. We set these up in our small living room area and fold them up at the end of the day when cleaning up. You’ll definitely want to order at least two if your child will be practicing cartwheels, rolls, or anything remotely similar to what a gymnastics gym will have them do.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jairam

customer_reviews.title: She is a beginner so I'm not sure how good it would be for a seasoned gymnast but it ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my daughter as she wanted it to practice her gymnastics at home. She is a beginner so I'm not sure how good it would be for a seasoned gymnast but it works great for her especially for practicing her balance. It is durable and well constructed. The only downfall is that it is only 4 feet long which isn't really long enough for her to do everything she wants to, however, a second one can be attached to lengthen it. Do to the price we haven't bought a second one yet but most likely will in the near future.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Beam!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my daughter two 4 ft balance beams for Christmas. After reading many different reviews to many different brands I went with tumble track. The quality is great! The foam is very firm, and doesn't give in when someone stands on it. The two are connected by velcro to make it longer. The bottoms on each beam are different colors, but that doesn't matter, as I was more concered about the quality. I would definetly recommend this beam for your gymnast to practice at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for obstacle course!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to our obstacle courses in kids martial arts classes. They are just what I was looking for. Firm enough for kids, a little squishy but usable for adults, and safe if anyone falls on it. They are so light our 4 year old students can carry them. We ordered 2 and we use them as a balance beam, for jumping from one to the other, and for jumping over in obstacle courses.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for practice at home
customer_reviews.text: I love the low profile on this, we store it under the couch and my daughter gets it out nearly daily for practice. It works great and feels high quality. The only caveat is that 4' is too short to practice cartwheels, etc, so we had to order another piece. I'm sure they do this for ease of storage but I almost wish they just came in a set of two. I tried another brand and I'm returning that and already ordered a second Tumbl track brand because they are way better quality.
customer_reviews.author: B. Blandford

customer_reviews.title: nice material, easy to store
customer_reviews.text: This is our second beam we bought to add onto the first one purchased over a year ago. Durable, nice material, easy to store. Kids needed longer beam so they could practice more things on the beam. If you have a gymnast I would recommend purchasing 2 of these so you have the length. I remember being surprised with the length the first time then realized it was only 4' in description but it definitely serves its purpose and does the job for our 3 gymnastics and is helping our toddler learn to balance.
customer_reviews.author: TammyG

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: I just became mother of the year for this gift! My daughter was thrilled! We don't have the room in our house for a real bean to practice on, so this is perfect to practice her routine and all the skills. She was nervous about getting hurt if she fell but quickly realized that it's soft enough to keep falling on! I can't get her off this thing. 10 yr level 3
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Product Colors Differ From What is Seen
customer_reviews.text: I do like the quality of the beam. It may be a little short for what my 5-yo likes to do on it, but I knew size when purchasing. What I didn't know is that the color would be different. The base of the beam is NOT blue, it is red with the brown covering. I won't return it because I want to give it to my daughter for Christmas, but I'm not happy with the color. I wanted blue, the photos all showed blue but that is not what I got :(
customer_reviews.author: EmilyB

customer_reviews.title: These are great. She loves practicing on these and they are ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in team gymnastics- level 3. We bought her one beam for Christmas and quickly realized she really needed 2 beams. These are great. She loves practicing on these and they are very lightweight and easy to move, so you can store easily and pull out when ready for a work out. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: do not recommend! We bought two and one was stiff and the other was very squishy.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two for our kids. We pulled them out to test them and one was much more stiffer then the other. They also were not blue, they were hot pink. We sent them back right away! Not worth the money!! Don't waste your time or money on this!
customer_reviews.author: parent2011

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girls (6 and 4) to practice their gymnastics and cartwheels. These are so perfect for them. They can do their routines without having to worry about getting hurt. They are soft yet have the perfect firmness to them so they dont get banged up. I purchased two of them and I think that just one would have been hard for even my 6 year old to do a cartwheel on but two of them is good. Love Tumbl Trak products!
customer_reviews.author: Cre

customer_reviews.title: So thrilled there’s a storable practice mean for home!
customer_reviews.text: Fun, affordable, easy storage. Great for home practice for my thin build 7 year old gymnast. I’m not sure how well it would work for big kids. I’m going to buy another to make it longer because she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: The Stuffbuyers

customer_reviews.title: Quality beam for young gymnast
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing (you really need two to do cartwheels etc). Great product. Bummed that this time it came with pink on the back, not blue like it did before. I don't see anything stating it would come in pink.
customer_reviews.author: Shane B.

customer_reviews.title: Short...will need 2
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her beam. It is like the ones she uses at practice. I like that we were able to add a beam to our gym at home so she could practice. She is not able to practice many skills because the beam is short and you will need to order two. I ordered a second beam which is currently in transit. I will update once the second beam arrives and we attach them together.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: We bought this balance beam for my then 6-year-old daughter a few years ago and all of her friends love to us it. We decided to buy one for my daughter's BFF, who's 8 years old, and she loves it and so do her 3 younger siblings.
customer_reviews.author: MLP

customer_reviews.title: High-quality and easy storage
customer_reviews.text: My kids are really enjoying the floor beam! Much higher quality and sturdier than I expected. I really like that we can store these and the gymnastics mat easily under the bed when they're not in use. A single piece 8' section wouldn't have stowed away so easily. I recommend buying two as I'm not sure one section would be long enough to do much with.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin B.

customer_reviews.title: Great balance beam for practice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old daughter. She uses it indoors and its really helped her improve her balance and become more comfortable on the beam. Very nice quality too. I'd reccomend two if your child is older or practicing more advanced things as the length is a little too short for some things.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Eimer

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling. Sturdy enough to actually work for practicing.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy build for a compact "travel" balance beam. Great for young kids deciding whether or not they want to do gymnastics or when they are traveling to grandma's house to show off. They link together very well.
customer_reviews.author: M_R

customer_reviews.title: We have a large family and she would like to take gymnastics
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my daughter. We have a large family and she would like to take gymnastics, but it is too pricey. When we surprised her with this beam she was overjoyed! She plays on it every day as often as possible and since she had Christmas money from grandparents she used it to purchase another section of beam. She watches videos on youtube to gain knowledge on the different ways she can utilize the beam. If she ever has an opportunity to do gymnastics outside of the house she will be ahead of the game!
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom

customer_reviews.title: Product has good texture(non slip) and is very firm for her weight ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased for 9 year old granddaughter who is 6 months into gymnastics. She loves it and is practicing cartwheels, balance, etc. She is 50 pounds. Product has good texture(non slip) and is very firm for her weight range. Definitely need two lengths to do anything. The velco attachment for keeping them together works well. Good product for value. She will outgrow in a year or so if she continues gymnastics, but is great (safe) starter. Would buy again and recommend for similar use.
customer_reviews.author: john david hamrick

customer_reviews.title: It comes in a box and it's just fancy cardboard shaped like a balanced beam
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for xmas. It comes in a box and it's just fancy cardboard shaped like a balanced beam. My daughter is in real gymnastics and has had no use fir this thing. Big waste should of returned it when I had the chance. It has zero purpose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Kids Luv It!
customer_reviews.text: My two granddaughters (ages 3 and 6) really enjoy this beam. We have two attached together to lengthen their “platform” and both often play on them together.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for granddaughter who has one just like it. She asked for a 2nd beam to ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for granddaughter who has one just like it. She asked for a 2nd beam to attach to the first so she can accurately perform her gymnastics.
customer_reviews.author: Ardella Heimgartner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing beam! My daughter loves practicing her gymnastics skills ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing beam! My daughter loves practicing her gymnastics skills on this! I bought two and put the together and it make the perfect fit! I honestly think that one is too small and hard to do any tricks on.
customer_reviews.author: rina torrento

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is low to the floor so I ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this beam. I like that it is low to the floor so I don't have to worry as much about her falling without a mat under her when she practices at home. It is not very long but I like that it is small enough for her to use it in her bedroom and get some energy out on days that the weather isn't great for going outside.
customer_reviews.author: amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed. Ordered 2 blue, one came purple ...
customer_reviews.text: Very dissapointed. Ordered 2 blue, one came purple, also one is more firm than the other and they don't seem to butt up together very well. Hopefully the seller/company will resolve this and contact me...
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is absolutely in love with her balance beam. We only ordered one because we wanted to make sure it would work but now we will be ordering more to interlock. We all enjoy using it. It has quickly become a favorite in our house!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa9479

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a higher rating except for the fact that I order 2 of these and they were slightly different in material, color and size. So while they connect together fine they are not flush as one is a little higher than the other. Disappointing, but still usable and serve the purpose. You are going to want 2 of these as one is too short for proper practice.
customer_reviews.author: Charm

customer_reviews.title: Great! Squishier than expected, though.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't buy this for an older elementary/teen kid because it does "squish" with adult weight on it. Great for the kids, though! I love that I can detatch and slide them under the bed when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wimer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at-home practice!
customer_reviews.text: This was the 3rd piece of beam we ordered. We originally purchased 2 and my daughter loved it so much we got a third. Lightweight and portable. Easy to setup inside the home. Great for practicing. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased one for my granddaughter to practice moves at home ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one for my granddaughter to practice moves at home. She utilizes it enough I will be getting another to lengthen her bar. I appreciate she can practice with no fear of falling.
customer_reviews.author: Rebbiej

customer_reviews.title: Great construction and plan on buying her another for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 3yr old daughter and she loves it. Before buying I was concerned about it being foam and possibly not being firm enough. However, it supports my 220lbs. Great construction and plan on buying her another for the next holiday.
customer_reviews.author: WMBrock

customer_reviews.title: This seems like a great product but I ordered this expecting it ...
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great product but I ordered this expecting it to be blue and it was red. Not sure why it shows a picture of a blue beam and no where in the description does it say it may be a random color. Other than that this seems like a great quality product. I'm giving this 4 stars simply because we haven't actually used it yet and because of the color confusion.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Safe fun for little ones
customer_reviews.text: My four yr old loves this. It's very safe due to the padding and can be used on various floor types (hardwood, carpet etc) with two much slippage. I gave only four stars because it was a little pricey for what it is, in my opinion. It is well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect practice beam for the young gymnast!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this beam for my daughter's third birthday. She began in a recreational gymnastics class a few months ago and loves it. We were looking for something similar to the actual beams used at her gym but practical for use and storage in a small apartment. This beam not only met but exceeded my expectations. It is very durable with quality construction, light weight, and takes up a small space. For a three year old just starting in gymnastics for recreation this beam is the perfect size and quality. She is able to safely practice her beam skills at home without needing a professional gym set up. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Clementine Williams

customer_reviews.title: Exaclty as expected
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren are under 6 and they love it. Not for people over 100lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Junie Q

customer_reviews.title: 10 Year Old Love Them
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and my 10 year old daughter (about 4 1/2 feet tall) has been able to practice her beam cartwheels and other skills perfectly in our apartment. There is a little more give in the beam than a normal regulation beam, but it is great for practice. After almost a month, no tears and the material is holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves it. Takes a beating as she uses it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Martin B.

customer_reviews.title: great, but buy 2!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, definitely need to buy 2 though, 1 is way too short for any kind of flip or activity on it. Very lightweight but it does hold up the kids well so far. Only had it for a few days but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: rick901

customer_reviews.title: It's a very sturdy and high quality made floor beam
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my 7 year old daughter. It's a very sturdy and high quality made floor beam. My only recommendation is that you purchase two to connect together. I initially purchased one and decided that the 4ft. wasn't enough for her to practice with.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Daughter likes it.
customer_reviews.text: I misread and thought I was getting 2 pieces, I only got one. My mistake. My kid is happy, so I’m happy, I just wish there were 2 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: 808Aloha

customer_reviews.title: ... for 3 years now and it still is in perfect condition as its quality is supreme
customer_reviews.text: my budding gymnast has used this for 3 years now and it still is in perfect condition as its quality is supreme!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: easy to move even for a child
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves this and plays with it all the time. It’s grea for practice. Well made, easy to move even for a child, durable.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Mccammon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beginners, but just a tad short. My 5 year old can manage to do only one cartwheel. I suggest buying two to add to the length. Other than that, it is sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, but note that it's only 4 feet long ...
customer_reviews.text: solid, comfortable, but note that it's only 4 feet long which by it's self is pretty short to do much of anything on. I highly recommend buying at least 2. They Velcro together!
customer_reviews.author: scharlee m gray

customer_reviews.title: Goes well with TumbleTrak mat.
customer_reviews.text: Item is just as described. This coupled with the Tumble Trak floor mat was the perfect set for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Beyer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for my seven-year-old. I might need to get another one to make it longer as she barely can make a cart wheel on it. It's great quality was a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built I can play on it with my kids and it supports all three of us.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Childs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for our small house
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for our small house. Very light, my 8 yr old carrys it outside and back into the house. We bought 2 so she could practice beam routines. They fold up together and we tuck them in a corner of the living room. No problem.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ferrara

customer_reviews.title: Become a winner
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Xmas for my daughter She uses daily now is placing first And second on the beam well worth The money shipping very fast👍
customer_reviews.author: Russell de vore

customer_reviews.title: Great but too small
customer_reviews.text: The beam itself is great. Am disappointed with the size. You really need to purchase 2 for kiddos to really have meaningful use (and my daughter is a small 6 year old).
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great product for our daughter!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got the balance beam and out daughter was ecstatic it arrived! Opened it up and she got right on it and was so happy to use it. It's not so large but good enough for the space we have. She is a beginner so with time we will get a couple more so she has a longer beam. I like that it is light and easy for her to pick up and easy storage. Happy daughter happy parents!!
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: great beginning balance beam
customer_reviews.text: great beginning balance beam. My daughter who is 7 loves it for practicing flips and cartwheels because it is ground level
customer_reviews.author: alziahangel

customer_reviews.title: It's a Great home track
customer_reviews.text: I surprised My 11yr old daughter with this & she loves gymnastics I set it up in my basement & I can't keep her from the basement now after she learns something in her gymnastics class she can't wait to come home to practice what she learned. It's a Great home track !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mo'nique

customer_reviews.title: Great product for both my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great product for both my 3 year old, and 10 year old daughters. It is big enough, as well as sturdy enough for both girls. Would recommend for children practicing, and learning gymnastics.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Koenig

customer_reviews.title: This is a hit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect practice beam for home. I purchased this for a young gymnast who loves practicing at home. She loves it! I think I'll get her another 4-ft section for Christmas!

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy beam!
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to get another one to add to the beam I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hi im eight. I take gymnastic class. When i first got it i didn't like it. It took a day or so to get used too it and it really helped me alot to get where i needed on the beam. I really love this beam and i hope you get it. And its also fun to practice on.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Practice with out risk
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my niece, she being a gymnast likes to practice without the risk of falling from the beam while learning new abilities. Turned out great, if thinking of it get a pair or more.
customer_reviews.author: Mdleo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 4 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 4 year old gymnast. Soft so she won’t get hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Keen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 5 year old niece. Her and my 3 year old nephew love it. Wish it was a little longer but they don't seem to mind. It helped showing my niece the product video to give her ideas on what to use the beam for. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my lil gymnast
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I wanted for my daughter who just started w/gymnastics....I might have to buy another to attach to this one and make a longer beam.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Gitzlaff

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this beam
customer_reviews.text: This is a great practice beam for beginning gymnasts! Close to the floor, firm enough for skills, but soft to minimize bumping and knocking into furniture as they carry it from room to room. I purchased two and connect them, for stunts.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  But I suggest...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my daughters who are gymnast to practice on. The are a little flimsy so you have to work with them a little to make sure they stay attached well when using 2 or more. I would say it probably stays together better when placed on carpeted area or a rug. I love it though. The kids are having a blast with it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jent

customer_reviews.title: Well made and works great for her practice
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this almost every night to practice. I may have to order an additional 4 foot section. Well made and works great for her practice.
customer_reviews.author: D.A.See Images

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love the beam. I purchased two of them they are 3 and 1 years old. Perfect for learning the basics!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: this was the perfect gift for my daughter who just got into gymnastics!
customer_reviews.author: HunterRunner

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It is holding up great. My daughter users it all the time. Great quality. Could use a second one for more length.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam F.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters really enjoy this Tumbl Trak. I'm sure I'll be buying another section before long! It seems to be well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: For personal home use it would be nice to have 5-6 feet
customer_reviews.text: 4-feet is a little too short to play on, we may have to purchase an additional section but, that makes 8-feet and then you get in to where is the space for that. For personal home use it would be nice to have 5-6 feet. Something in between the 4 or 8 ft. Other then that it is great! Our 4 yr old is loving it.
customer_reviews.author: LYNDA SALISBURY

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to handle balance beam
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and easy to handle balance beam. Works gray for the purpose in which it was bought. Soft material and sturdy enough to maintain my almost 200lb frame.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 and 4 year olds love this! It was the perfect purchase for beginning gymnasts!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Godziszewski

customer_reviews.title: almost useless at this length
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to look at the length. It was shorter then expected, almost useless at this length
customer_reviews.author: Zalman Kahn

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these balance beams for my daughter and she loves them. Nice quality, great for practice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great practice beam for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Definitely only made for lightweight kids, but we knew that before hand. Won't support weight of an adult without some potential damage. Great for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! My daughter likes this alot
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My daughter likes this alot. From the picture I thought it was longer, if I wanted to spend more money I would buy another one but for the price she can just have one and continue to not take up as much room in the living room as she already does!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Humphreys Steele

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but too short with ONE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beam for at home use! Unfortunately in the Christmas rush, I didn't realize you have to purchase TWO SEPERATELY!!!! One is much too short! My daughter is 9 and doing the splits on it, her ankles go past the ends! I agree with others, buy two or it should be upto two feet longer!!!
customer_reviews.author: CnKsMom

customer_reviews.title: ... width and height of it makes it safe and fun for children
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to get "soft" on the sides quickly but the width and height of it makes it safe and fun for children.
customer_reviews.author: MKP

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: very small for the price...sorry I bought this for over $60
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice light weight product. My 1, 7, &11 year old can use just fine, but definitely get 2! Strong Velcro and great Christmas present this year for our active kids!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle D.

customer_reviews.title: great quality getting another soon for a 8 foot
customer_reviews.text: xmas gift for a budding gym girl , great quality getting another soon for a 8 foot lenght

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my granddaughter and she loves it. Her friends and cousins come over and they all use it often. I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: NOT Flimsy, very solid! Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: I will add photos after Christmas! I just received this and opened it...it's exactly how they state it is..it definitely is not flimsy..very light weight, but solid! It's larger than I expected too! Very pleased as a parent hope she is pleased with it!

customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered one and will do it again when she wants her beam to even longer.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for home gym
customer_reviews.text: If you want a full beam order 2. They are light and easy to join together. Shipped quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight, my daughter can move the two of them velcro'ed together with relative ease. Tumbl Trak is incredible, really good stuff for the home gymnast.

customer_reviews.text: I ended up ordering two. They piece together nicely. My 5 yr old granddaughter loves it.

customer_reviews.text: Definitely good for toddlers or beginners. Was hoping it would be longer.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my four year old!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my four year old who started gymnastics last year. Two different grandparents purchased them so we'd have a longer piece. Fits together easily with strong Velcro and she can move them around all in her own.
customer_reviews.author: Teachingmom

customer_reviews.title: I love this beam
customer_reviews.text: I love this beam. My daughter is abscessed with gymnastics and loves to practice her beam routines on this. It is very durable and my daughter has spilled water on it and covered it in gym chalk it stands up to it and dries and you can wipe it off with a damp cloth if it gets dirty. I would highly recommend this for anyone who is looking for a sturdy, firm, and durable beam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for small children
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 2 year old. It's just a little short. We will probably get her another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 5 and 6 yr old love this!!! Keep it inside the house for them to play

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My little gymnast loves this! She is 4 and loves to practice on it. She will get it down, walk on it and practice her skills from class. Great that it gives her the same feel as the real one at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Construction appears to be durable
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Construction appears to be durable. Depending on age and gymnastics level, it probably makes sense to get two.
customer_reviews.author: JimF25

product_meta.title: Tumbl Trak 4ft Sectional Gymnastics Training Floor Balance Beam
product_meta.description: Tumbl Trak?s 4ft. sectional balance beam helps gymnasts gain confidence walking on a 4in beam. The balance beam is also perfect for practicing skills like donkey kicks, handstands, jumps, leaps, and obstacle courses. Beam is competition-width and features a suede surface, making it the perfect sectional balance beam for home or gym use. To create longer lengths, simply connect two or more beams together using the permanently attached Velcro fasteners. It’s a perfect balance beam for kids just getting started with gymnastics.
feature_bullets: ✅TOP QUALITY - A smooth synthetic suede cover sewn tightly around a tough 2 layer foam offer the perfect amount of firmness to practice on. Don’t be fooled by imitation beams that use cheap foam which will break down after only a short period of use

✅SMART DESIGN - Each beam comes with velcro on either end to allow 2 or more to be joined together to make a longer training area. Each beam is 4ft long with a 4in top. The base is 8in wide providing optimal stability when the beam is on the ground
✅LIGHTWEIGHT - One key benefit of the sectional beam is its lightweight design. Each beam weighs approximately 4lbs allowing for your athlete to move it from room to room, and store it away easily

✅WE KNOW GYMNASTICS - When you purchase a product from Tumbl Trak, you know that you’re getting a TRUE gymnastics product. Coaches, former gymnasts, and industry experts make up our staff ensuring you get the best product for your athlete

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
